game.name: Barbie Crazy Shopping
game.description:
Barbie is known for her cute smile and friendly nature. However, she looks upset today due to a reason that it has been long when the princess went outside for shopping. For this reason, this cute princess has made out a plan to shop for her desirable things. But, she is new to the city, so the princess is not aware of the nearby market. Would you give her helping hands to the needy? Join Barbie Crazy Shopping game and be prepared to help Barbie to buy some trendy clothing!
She has already checked out her closet and found nothing interesting to put on. Your objective in this brand new dressing game for girls is to guide the princess to enjoy a hassle-free shopping and buy some fashionable outfits for her. Make sure to help her first to collect some money and then go on a lovely shopping adventure with her. You as a fashionista have a wonderful styling and fashion sense, and the shopping store will also have a good range of trendy cloth options to offer. 
You can spend only the amount which you collect during the beginning of the gameplay. Give your princess an elegant pink color frock having black color ribbon on its corner and combine it with a pink color sandal and a matching handbag. You can also choose a purple color frock with pink color ribbon on its corner and combine it with a pair of long matching shoes. Feel free to explore the outfit options placed on the shelves that you can see on the right side of the screen in this html5 princess dress up game! Enjoy more doll dress up simulation games online, no download required!
